trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_SEQ_00<tab>Qhoterl Pasol has a nose for perfumes.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine splendid amber at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid amber to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather splendid lavender at Mjrl's Regret)) ((Deliver the splendid lavender to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Spearfish a splendid pirarucu in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta)) ((Deliver the splendid pirarucu to Qhoterl Pasol)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>You're doubtless aware, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, that we Qitari possess eminently keen noses. Even in pitch-black darkness, we can discern one of our own from another and locate them.

TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_001<tab>However, the caverns we explore can be filled with strange gases that confuse our sense of smell. To cut through this haze, we've taken to using a special perfume, which I would concoct with your assistance.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_010<tab>At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find amber─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not mine three pieces for me?
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_020<tab>At Mjrl's Regret, it is possible to find lavender─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not gather three sprigs for me?
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030<tab>In the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta dwells a fish called the pirarucu─a key ingredient in the perfume. Will you not catch one for me?

TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_040<tab>That will suffice to make a goodly batch of the stuff to help keep us safe during our explorations. Much obliged, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_100_010<tab>It is possible to find amber at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three pieces for me.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_100_020<tab>It is possible to find lavender at Mjrl's Regret. I'd be much obliged if you could obtain three sprigs for me.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_100_030<tab>It is possible to find pirarucu in the waters of Lake Tusi Mek'ta. I'd be much obliged if you could catch one for me.
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_050<tab><sniff> <sniff> You've returned with what I seek, and no mistake. Now, if I might examine it...
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_060<tab>My, such a potent smell! This will serve most splendidly, oh yes!
TEXT_BANQIQ107_03812_QHOTERLPASOL_000_061<tab>With a spot of refining, it will make a scent that is unmistakable in the caverns. Hehe, 'tis time once again to put my skills as a perfumer to use!
